mapper.select: select #{loginApi} as login_api, #{userid} as userid, #{username} as username, #{email} as email, #{photo} as photo
mapper.insert: insert into member (login_api, userid, username, email, photo) values (#{loginApi}, #{userid}, #{username}, #{email}, #{photo})
mapper.select: select * from member where login_api=#{loginApi} and userid=#{userid}
